name: FAT D-FENDER
description:
In a dystopian apocalyptic world where vegetables and fruit mutate the people that eat them. There is one carniverous survivor. THE FAT D-FENDER!

But the mutated veggie fruity people are trying to kill
the awesome protagonist (with guns). How many of them can you deny?

Game made in less than a day, but still made with a lot of love <3 ofcourse.

Made by

Erdeppol (https://twitter.com/Erdeppol)
larje100 (https://twitter.com/Lars_Wilms)
